verses.roman:
ei daśa jana prabhura saṅge gāya, dhāya
āra saba sampradāya cāri dike gāya

synonyms: ei daśa jana—these ten persons; prabhura—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; saṅge—with; gāya—chant; dhāya—run; āra—others; saba—all; sampradāya—groups of men; cāri dike—all around; gāya—chant.
translation: These devotees [Svarūpa Dāmodara and the devotees in his charge] sang along with the Lord, and they also ran beside Him. All the other groups of men also sang.
